Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot/Punch:



Nemesis Enforcer activated the outer intercom of the Alliance base.

    ~Maximals, this is Nemesis Enforcer.  Leave now and await Zardus' 
demands.  It's the only way you will get your Maximal comrades back...alive.  
You'll attack, but to brake through our defenses, hull, and forces just to 
get to them, will cost you dearly and take over a mega-cycle.  And by then, 
well, we have seven people guarding the Maximals and they can open fire 
anytime I give the order.  
    So, either back off, or they die and you are weakened even more.  It's 
your choice.  Either way, the Alliance is gonna have FUN TONIGHT!~ Nemesis 
deactivated the intercom.

"Bravo!  Bravo!  Let's hope they attack."

"Why?  There is a probability they could win."

"So we can watch the base blow up and see the Maximal corpses!"

"What!" Punch yelled to Scattershot and Nemesis Enforcer.  "If Zardus came 
back and saw his base...nothing but flaming rubble...he'd hunt us down like 
dogs!"

"Maybe, but he'd have to beat us!" Scattershot laughed, throwing his head 
back in laughter, DeathStorm's head sliding off his head, hitting the ground.
"Slag!" he picked up the head and put it back on, getting to the sensors.
